# chirp

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/m-pilarski/chirp/actions/workflows/check-standard.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/m-pilarski/chirp/actions/workflows/check-standard.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

chirp provides tools to collect and process tweets in R `r emoji::emoji("dodo")`

## Installation

You can install the development version of chirp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("m-pilarski/chirp")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(chirp)
## basic example code
```
